colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO SDE LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'PHRIN LAS CHAR RGYUN BSKUL BA'I 'BRUG SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, NGOS KYIS GSAR DU BZUNG BA'I CHOS SDE DGE TSOGS GLING DU RGYAL PO SKU LNGA SRUNG MAR MNGA' GSOL TE, PHO BRANG GSAR BZHES DANG RTEN 'DZUGS RGYUN GTOR SOGS TSAD LDAN SGRUB SKABS ZLA RE BZHIN GSOL MCHOD BYED PA LA CHO GA RGYA SPA ZHIG BYUNG NA LEGS PAR BSAM NAS 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG MTSAN LTAS BZANG POR RLOM CHOG PA DGA' 'ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BAS RKYEN BYAS TE, KU SA LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I @035B YI GE PA NI BLO GROS DANG LDAN PA AOR DU SU HANG GIN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR MAS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
